title: Ticket #431: Submit events in EVENT_LOG from SOAP submission
description: The EVENT_LOG is written to from CloseConnection, which is a code path that is not likely hit when a job is submitted via SOAP. It should be verified that SOAP submissions register in the EVENT_LOG.
remarks:
